feed.title: WhoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.32.0 - Support for Ollama inside Docker
entry.content:
• Support Ollama inside the Docker
    • Automatic Ollama host search inside Docker
    • Environment variables (WHODB_OLLAMA_HOST, WHODB_OLLAMA_PORT) to specify Ollama specifications

Previously in WhoDB

  • Release latest test by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/1
  • Release fix import build failure by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/2
  • feat(frontend): remove default by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/3
  • Fix casing issue by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/4
  • Add mysql support, fix graph logic by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/5
  • Release 0.2.0 by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/6
  • feat(frontend): add url params by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/7
  • Release Minor by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/8
  • Fix logging in loader alignment by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/9
  • [Release] Sqlite3 Support by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/10
  • [Feature] Support SQLite3 by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/11
  • [Feature] Add table virtualization to ensure big data can be loaded easily by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/14
  • [Feature] Add inline edits by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/15
  • [Feature] Fully support inline edit for Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite3 by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/16
  • [Release] Support inline actions and preview by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/17
  • [Release] Add new Monaco editor library & fix preview buggy movements by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/18
  • [Feature] Add MongoDB support by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/19
  • [Release] Support Exploration of MongoDB (Raw Execute coming soon) by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/20
  • [Feature] Add support for Redis by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/21
  • [Release] Support for Redis by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/22
  • Release UX issues by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/23
  • [Feature] Change Raw Execute to a Jupyter book like scratch pad by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/25
  • [Release] New Scratchpad (renamed from Raw Execute) and downloading graphs as images capability by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/30
  • [Bug] Fix the logo in frontend & docs update by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/34
  • [Feature] Add advanced section in login by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/38
  • [Release] Add advanced form in login by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/40
  • [Feature] Add support for Elastic Search by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/31
  • [Support] Add MariaDB (use MySQL details) by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/41
  • [Release] Add MariaDB & ElasticSearch Support by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/42
  • [Feature] Add dark mode by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/45
  • [Feature] Add Dark Mode by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/46
  • Fixes Release by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/48
  • [Release] by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/49
  • [Release] MongoDB easy connection url fix by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/50
  • [Support] UI based filters by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/53
  • [Support] Add UI based smart filters by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/54
  • [Release] fix for MongoDB DNS Check option by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/56
  • [Release] Bug fix for backdrop filter and logo by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/64
  • [Support] Add storage units and rows by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/55
  • [Release] Support add functionality to all supported databases by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/66
  • Add support for login profiles from environment variables by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/68
  • Release support for environment variable login profiles by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/69
  • Add support for choosing available databases In the sidebar by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/70
  • Release support for choosing from multiple databases by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/71
  • Fix blurry export from graph by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/72
  • Create CONTRIBUTING.md by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/77
  • Create CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/76
  • Delete functionality for PostgreSQL + several small tweaks by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/73
  • [Feature] Add multi select to table to allow easy delete and export by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/78
  • Add Chat GPT like interface to interact with any SQL database by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/67
  • should be correct dependabot by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/79
  • [Feature] Add multi-select delete and export by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/90
  • [Patch] Fix update issue by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/92
  • Release fix for exporting and search on Houdini by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/93
  • [Fix] Rename Houdini on the sidebar. by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/94

New Contributors

  • @modelorona made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/77

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/commits/0.32.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.33.0 - Bump up the libraries & fix conditional querying
entry.content:
• Bump libraries used
    • Chi Router [GoLang]
    • Postgres Driver [GoLang]
    • GQLParser [GoLang]
    • GraphQL [Typescript]
    • React Testing library [Typescript]
    • Apollo Client [Typescript]
    • Tailwind-merge [Typescript]
  • Fix Apollo client onComplete bug caused by the upgrade
  • Fix conditional querying bug for Postgres

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump graphql from 16.8.2 to 16.9.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/89
  • build(deps): bump tailwind-merge from 2.3.0 to 2.5.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/88
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/react from 13.4.0 to 16.0.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/87
  • build(deps): bump @apollo/client from 3.10.5 to 3.11.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/86
  • build(deps-dev): bump tailwindcss from 3.4.4 to 3.4.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/85
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.12 to 2.5.16 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/84
  • build(deps): bump gorm.io/driver/postgres from 1.5.7 to 1.5.9 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/83
  • build(deps): bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.16.0 to 1.16.1 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/82
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-chi/chi/v5 from 5.0.12 to 5.1.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/81
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.48 to 0.17.49 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/80

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/89

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.32.0...0.33.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.34.0 - Add Integration for ChatGPT and Anthropic
entry.content:
• Add support for ChatGPT integration
  • Add support for Anthropic integration
  • Add UI support for adding external models with tokens
  • Add external model's credentials persistence in the browser cache

What's Changed

  • Fix up ChatGPT integration by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/102
  • build(deps): bump @types/jest from 27.5.2 to 29.5.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/105
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript-operations from 4.2.1 to 4.2.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/106
  • build(deps): bump monaco-editor from 0.50.0 to 0.51.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/107
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/lodash from 4.17.5 to 4.17.7 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/109
  • build(deps): bump gorm.io/gorm from 1.25.10 to 1.25.11 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/110
  • build(deps): bump @types/node from 16.18.98 to 22.5.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/111

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.33.0...0.34.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.35.0 - Refactor GraphQL schema and minor frontend improvements
entry.content:
• Scratchpad now shows "Action Executed" for non-Select queries.
  • Change GraphQL schema in the backend to remove "type" from each query. This is now supported by the cookie credentials and will be used in the HTTP clients.
  • Bug fix: adding storage unit and keyboard cursor getting unfocused when adding field names is now fixed.
  • Bump frontend and backend libraries
    • GraphQL CodeGen
    • DagreJS
    • React Types
    • React Flow
    • UUID Types
    • Apollo Client
    • Redus Toolkit
    • React Testing Library [a few sub libraries]
    • Elastic Search Backend Integration
    • Web Vitals
    • Framer Motion

Note: non-affecting changes - there is a HTTP wrapper over the GraphQL resolvers now that will be used in the HTTP clients in each language. This will not affect current workflows as it is only used by the clients and in API Gateway workflows.

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump github.com/elastic/go-elasticsearch/v8 from 8.14.0 to 8.15.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/124
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/react from 16.0.0 to 16.0.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/123
  • build(deps): bump @reduxjs/toolkit from 2.2.5 to 2.2.7 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/122
  • build(deps): bump @apollo/client from 3.11.4 to 3.11.5 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/120
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/uuid from 9.0.8 to 10.0.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/119
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/jest-dom from 5.17.0 to 6.5.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/121
  • Change: Remove type from the schema by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/130
  • build(deps): bump web-vitals from 2.1.4 to 4.2.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/125
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.2.10 to 11.3.31 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/126
  • build(deps): bump @types/react from 18.3.4 to 18.3.5 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/127
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/user-event from 13.5.0 to 14.5.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/128
  • build(deps): bump @types/node from 22.5.1 to 22.5.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/131
  • Add HTTP Endpoints by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/103

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.34.0...0.35.0
